subject: Economy
question_en: What is the GDP of India in 2020?
explanation_en: According to the World Bank, the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2020 was approximately Rs. 24.51 trillion (US$320 billion). Therefore, the correct answer is option B.
